events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate and will begin the review shortly.
The candidate's application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on the resume keywords and experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the Software Engineer candidate's recruitment process.
The initial screening call with the candidate went well; they demonstrated good knowledge of software development principles.
The candidate has responded promptly and positively to the initial screening feedback and is eager to proceed to technical interviews.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the engineering team for next Wednesday at 3 PM.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, showcasing strong problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
Following the technical success, the candidate's HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
The HR interview went well; the candidate expressed strong enthusiasm for the company culture and benefits.
An official job offer has been extended to the candidate including compensation and role details.
The candidate responded with positive feedback on the offer and has requested a short period to consider it.
The candidate has officially accepted the offer and confirmed the start date for onboarding activities.
The new engineer's onboarding process has started, including system access and team introductions.
All recruitment steps are complete and the engineering hire has been successfully closed and integrated into the team.
